f21c92c2c602.name: Simon

paragraphs.name: e2a9
paragraphs.text: Well last week we were still having daytime temperatures over 30°C, with humidity over 85% — a wonderful pair of numbers that used to end sometime in February, but decided to stay long past their welcome. It’s nice to finally switch the air conditioning off…I’ll save money for a few weeks before it gets “too cold” (for my greyhound).

My dog doesn’t care if my sadness is warranted and she doesn’t think about the bone she’d rather chew. She isn’t embarrassed when her tail curls because she thinks my shame is hers. She isn’t worried her reaction will make my state worse, because her reaction is consuming. My sadness is all there is.
paragraphs.name: 9cf2

paragraphs.text: My dog doesn’t care if my sadness is warranted and she doesn’t think about the bone she’d rather chew. She isn’t embarrassed when her tail curls because she thinks my shame is hers. She isn’t worried her reaction will make my state worse, because her reaction is consuming. My sadness is all there is.

paragraphs.name: 35b0
paragraphs.text: Awww! I love ‘there is no bad weather, only improper clothing.’ Reminds me of Ani, who had some sort of digestion thing a few years ago, where her food wasn’t processing/being digested. She ballooned out despite pumpkin and yogurt and spinach. She could barely waddle. We finally gave up on our vet and dragged her to the pet ER, where she insisted on…

e487b62c019a.title: Animals are so much better than we are because of their simplicity.

paragraphs.name: 27bf
paragraphs.text: Animals are so much better than we are because of their simplicity. My cat doesn’t care about the red spot on my nose, my haircut, or my grades. He loves me because I am kind and feed him. It’s easy. There’s no conceit, no calculated planning. When he meows it’s not because he wants to be annoying, but because in his little mind the big wooden…

paragraphs.name: 1d2b
paragraphs.text: I saw a film about Desert Dawg at the Banff Mountain Film Festival World Tour, and his human was talking about how loving a dog makes you a better person. He said something like: you give them a few years of your life, and they give you all of theirs.
BRAVO!

paragraphs.name: daa1
paragraphs.text: This is so beautiful and profound. You have really captured the emotional connection between a pet and its human. Thank you.❤

paragraphs.name: ecc7
paragraphs.text: Thank you Sass! I was/am in a very weird place- overwhelmed by a world that seemed to be tumbling head over heels into crazy, while trying to adjust to changes in my own life. It all just rendered me speechless ! Something that friends/family/haters will swear is not possible. Such a weird thing- not knowing what to say. Thank you for the warm Welcome Back!❤❤❤❤

paragraphs.name: c3c1
paragraphs.text: Thanks so much, Tamyka! I’m envious of it turning cool where you are! It’s the first soggy edge of summer out here, which basically means I’m already whiny and miserable and it isn’t even the apex of Satan’s grundle yet. FML. (All of the dogs here have retaliated by ignoring everyone and everything. The cat is screaming at everyone. Good times. :D)

paragraphs.name: 0b80
paragraphs.text: You are a good dog mum, Sass. Someone told me one time that “no bad weather, just improper clothing” is an old Norwegian saying. I get a 100 megaton groan every time I utter that around wife. I think her last reply was, “Costa Rica, dude”. Thus, I was entirely shut down.

fb3d84c3d5a6.title: I’ve always been more of a dog person, but because of logistical nonsense, my pet collection took…

paragraphs.name: 25ef
paragraphs.text: I’ve always been more of a dog person, but because of logistical nonsense, my pet collection took root in the cat field. (We used to have three cats.) Each one was drastically different; completely different personalities, each of them varying textures of independent nonsense and inexplicable affection. Dogs are a totally different investment deal…

paragraphs.name: 70cd
paragraphs.text: There she is!!! I’ve been hoping you’d come back, Randy!! Good to see you here and, thank you so much for your per usual thoughtful and sweet comment. I was trying to get a bit of a snarky juxtaposition going between the title and the piece, like here is how my goofy dog behaves when she’s not eating cat poop. What does that say about us? Not sure it landed! Ha! 🎉😂 but it’s true anyway. She’s the best furry. ❤❤

paragraphs.name: f70d

paragraphs.name: d9d8
paragraphs.text: Wow. Tears here. Really felt that. Such a beautiful being with, which we humans are slow to learn, if ever. I thank you for sharing this so exquisitely.
